thread.title: Zendesk to Present at the Deutsche Bank 2015 Technology Conference
thread.title_full: Zendesk to Present at the Deutsche Bank 2015 Technology Conference

author: admin
title: Zendesk to Present at the Deutsche Bank 2015 Technology Conference
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 10:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Zendesk, Inc. 
SAN FRANCISCO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Zendesk, Inc. (NYSE:ZEN) today announced that Adrian McDermott, Senior Vice President of Product Development and Marc Cabi, Vice President of Finance and Head of Investor Relations will present at the Deutsche Bank 2015 Technology Conference at the Cosmopolitan Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada. 
Zendesk’s presentation is scheduled for Wednesday, September 16, 2015 at 11:40 a.m., Pacific Time. A live webcast and an archive version will be available for six months. Both will be accessible by visiting Zendesk’s investor website at investor.zendesk.com. 
About Zendesk: 
Zendesk provides a customer service platform designed to bring organizations and their customers closer together. With more than 60,000 paid customer accounts, Zendesk’s products are used by organizations in 150 countries and territories to provide support in more than 40 languages. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in San Francisco, Zendesk has operations in the United States, Europe, Asia, Australia and South America. Learn more at www.zendesk.com 
Source: Zendesk, Inc. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150910005363/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
